Amazing hotel best I have ever stayed in Attention to detail decor fantastic Must be the coolest place in London
I found the staff very friendly and facilitating The room was very comfortable and for the centre of London very peaceful
Absolutely delightful hotel an oasis of style and comfort in the middle of London. I wish I could have stayed longer
Good location in the centre of London close to Hyde Park Friendly staff Large room. The balcony was locked for safety reasons
Based in the heart of London with everything on your doorstep Warm friendly and welcoming staff that make your stay truly pleasurable
The staff were without exception friendly and courteous The hotel is a calm comfortable oasis in the centre of London a hidden gem
Staff amazingly helpful Gem in the centre of London with the personal touch Def not a hotel chain A more intimate hotel experience
